Uses of Package
com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event

  • Packages that use com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event 
    Package Description
    com.wizzer.mle.runtime
    This package contains the Java runtime engine for the Magic Lantern SDK.
    com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core
    This package contains the core Magic Lantern runtime engine modules.
    com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp
    This package contains the Magic Lantern runtime engine modules used to read and process a Digital Playprint.
    com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event
    This package contains the Magic Lantern runtime engine modules for processing events.
  • Classes in com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event used by com.wizzer.mle.runtime 
    Class and Description
    MleEventDispatcher
    MleEventDispatcher is used to synchronize the dispatching of Magic Lantern runtime events.
  • Classes in com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event used by com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core 
    Class and Description
    IMlePropChangeListener
    A "PropChange" event gets fired whenever an Actor changes a "bound" property.
  • Classes in com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event used by com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp 
    Class and Description
    MleEventCallback
    This abstract class may be used to register a callback handler for a specific event.
  • Classes in com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event used by com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event 
    Class and Description
    IMleEventCallback
    This interface is used to declare a callback handler for a MleEvent.
    IMleEventListener
    IMleEventListener is used to encapsulate a Magic Lantern listener for the MleEvent events.
    MleCue
    This class is a container for "cued" events.
    MleCueSheet
    This class manages a collection of cues.
    MleEvent
    MleEvent encapsulates a Magic Lantern event.
    MleEventManager
    This class is used to help manage events.
    MleEventManager.EventSetItem
    Utility class used to manage named events.
    MlePropChangeEvent
    A property change event.
